verses.verse: רָנִּ֥י <WH7442> Sing עֲקָרָ֖ה <WH6135> O barren לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יָלָ֑דָה <WH3205> thou [that] didst not bear פִּצְחִ֨י <WH6476> break forth רִנָּ֤ה <WH7440> into singing וְצַהֲלִי֙ <WH6670> and cry aloud לֹא־ <WH3808> no חָ֔לָה <WH2342> thou [that] didst not travail with child כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for רַבִּ֧ים <WH7227> for more בְּֽנֵי־ <WH1121> [are] the children שׁוֹמֵמָ֛ה <WH8074> of the desolate מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> than the children בְעוּלָ֖ה <WH1166> of the married wife אָמַ֥ר <WH559> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

הַרְחִ֣יבִי ׀ <WH7337> Enlarge מְק֣וֹם <WH4725> the place אָהֳלֵ֗ךְ <WH168> of thy tent וִירִיע֧וֹת <WH3407> the curtains מִשְׁכְּנוֹתַ֛יִךְ <WH4908> of thine habitations יַטּ֖וּ <WH5186> and let them stretch forth אַל־ <WH408> nay תַּחְשֹׂ֑כִי <WH2820> spare הַאֲרִ֙יכִי֙ <WH748> not lengthen מֵֽיתָרַ֔יִךְ <WH4340> thy cords וִיתֵדֹתַ֖יִךְ <WH3489> thy stakes חַזֵּֽקִי׃ <WH2388> and strengthen

כִּי־ <WH3588> for יָמִ֥ין <WH3225> on the right hand וּשְׂמֹ֖אול <WH8040> and on the left תִּפְרֹ֑צִי <WH6555> For thou shalt break forth וְזַרְעֵךְ֙ <WH2233> and thy seed גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> the Gentiles יִירָ֔שׁ <WH3423> shall inherit וְעָרִ֥ים <WH5892> cities נְשַׁמּ֖וֹת <WH8074> and make the desolate יוֹשִֽׁיבוּ׃ <WH3427> to be inhabited

אַל־ <WH408> nay תִּֽירְאִי֙ <WH3372> Fear כִּי־ <WH3588> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> no תֵב֔וֹשִׁי <WH954> not for thou shalt not be ashamed וְאַל־ <WH408> not תִּכָּלְמִ֖י <WH3637> neither be thou confounded כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> no תַחְפִּ֑ירִי <WH2659> for thou shalt not be put to shame כִּ֣י <WH3588> for בֹ֤שֶׁת <WH1322> the shame עֲלוּמַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5934> of thy youth תִּשְׁכָּ֔חִי <WH7911> for thou shalt forget וְחֶרְפַּ֥ת <WH2781> the reproach אַלְמְנוּתַ֖יִךְ <WH491> of thy widowhood לֹ֥א <WH3808> no תִזְכְּרִי־ <WH2142> and shalt not remember עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> more

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For בֹעֲלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH1166> [is] thine husband עֹשַׂ֔יִךְ <WH6213> For thy Maker יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> [is] his name וְגֹֽאֲלֵךְ֙ <WH1350> and thy Redeemer קְד֣וֹשׁ <WH6918> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> The God כָל־ <WH3605> of all הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the whole earth יִקָּרֵֽא׃ <WH7121> shall he be called

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when כְאִשָּׁ֧ה <WH802> thee as a woman עֲזוּבָ֛ה <WH5805> forsaking וַעֲצ֥וּבַת <WH6087> and grieved ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> in spirit קְרָאָ֣ךְ <WH7121> hath called יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God וְאֵ֧שֶׁת <WH802> and a wife נְעוּרִ֛ים <WH5271> of youth כִּ֥י <WH3588> when תִמָּאֵ֖ס <WH3988> when thou wast refused אָמַ֥ר <WH559> saith אֱלֹהָֽיִךְ׃ <WH430> thy God

בְּרֶ֥גַע <WH7281> moment קָטֹ֖ן <WH6996> For a small עֲזַבְתִּ֑יךְ <WH5800> have I forsaken וּבְרַחֲמִ֥ים <WH7356> mercies גְּדֹלִ֖ים <WH1419> thee but with great אֲקַבְּצֵֽךְ׃ <WH6908> will I gather

בְּשֶׁ֣צֶף <WH8241> In a little קֶ֗צֶף <WH7110> wrath הִסְתַּ֨רְתִּי <WH5641> I hid פָנַ֥י <WH6440> my face רֶ֙גַע֙ <WH7281> from thee for a moment מִמֵּ֔ךְ <WH4480> at וּבְחֶ֥סֶד <WH2617> kindness עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> but with everlasting רִֽחַמְתִּ֑יךְ <WH7355> will I have mercy אָמַ֥ר <WH559> on thee saith גֹּאֲלֵ֖ךְ <WH1350> thy Redeemer יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

כִּי־ <WH3588> that מֵ֥י <WH4325> For this [is as] the waters נֹ֙חַ֙ <WH5146> of Noah זֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise לִ֔י אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> When נִשְׁבַּ֗עְתִּי <WH7650> unto me for [as] I have sworn מֵעֲבֹ֥ר <WH5674> should no more go over מֵי־ <WH4325> that the waters נֹ֛חַ <WH5146> of Noah ע֖וֹד <WH5750> again עַל־ <WH5921> and הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the earth כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> So נִשְׁבַּ֛עְתִּי <WH7650> so have I sworn מִקְּצֹ֥ף <WH7107> that I would not be wroth עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> and וּמִגְּעָר־ <WH1605> with thee nor rebuke בָּֽךְ׃

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For הֶֽהָרִים֙ <WH2022> For the mountains יָמ֔וּשׁוּ <WH4185> shall depart וְהַגְּבָע֖וֹת <WH1389> and the hills תְּמוּטֶ֑נָה <WH4131> be removed וְחַסְדִּ֞י <WH2617> but my kindness מֵאִתֵּ֣ךְ <WH853> לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָמ֗וּשׁ <WH4185> shall not depart וּבְרִ֤ית <WH1285> from thee neither shall the covenant שְׁלוֹמִי֙ <WH7965> of my peace לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תָמ֔וּט <WH4131> be removed אָמַ֥ר <WH559> saith מְרַחֲמֵ֖ךְ <WH7355> that hath mercy יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

עֲנִיָּ֥ה <WH6041> O thou afflicted סֹעֲרָ֖ה <WH5590> tossed with tempest לֹ֣א <WH3808> not נֻחָ֑מָה <WH5162> [and] not comforted הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold אָנֹכִ֜י <WH595> I מַרְבִּ֤יץ <WH7257> behold I will lay בַּפּוּךְ֙ <WH6320> with fair colours אֲבָנַ֔יִךְ <WH68> thy stones וִיסַדְתִּ֖יךְ <WH3245> and lay thy foundations בַּסַּפִּירִֽים׃ <WH5601> with sapphires

וְשַׂמְתִּ֤י <WH7760> And I will make כַּֽדְכֹד֙ <WH3539> of agates שִׁמְשֹׁתַ֔יִךְ <WH8121> thy windows וּשְׁעָרַ֖יִךְ <WH8179> and thy gates לְאַבְנֵ֣י <WH68> stones אֶקְדָּ֑ח <WH688> of crystal וְכָל־ <WH3605> and your entire גְּבוּלֵ֖ךְ <WH1366> and all thy borders לְאַבְנֵי־ <WH68> stones חֵֽפֶץ׃ <WH2656> of pleasant

וְכָל־ <WH3605> All בָּנַ֖יִךְ <WH1121> And all thy children לִמּוּדֵ֣י <WH3928> [shall be] taught יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְרַ֖ב <WH7227> and great שְׁל֥וֹם <WH7965> [shall be] the peace בָּנָֽיִךְ׃ <WH1121> of thy children

בִּצְדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> In righteousness תִּכּוֹנָ֑נִי <WH3559> shalt thou be established רַחֲקִ֤י <WH7368> thou shalt be far מֵעֹ֙שֶׁק֙ <WH6233> from oppression כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> you will not תִירָ֔אִי <WH3372> for thou shalt not fear וּמִ֨מְּחִתָּ֔ה <WH4288> and from terror כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> it will not תִקְרַ֖ב <WH7126> for it shall not come near אֵלָֽיִךְ׃ <WH413> about

הֵ֣ן <WH2005> If גּ֥וֹר <WH1481> Behold they shall surely יָג֛וּר <WH1481> gather together אֶ֖פֶס <WH657> [but] not מֵֽאוֹתִ֑י <WH853> מִי־ <WH4310> by me whosoever גָ֥ר <WH1481> shall gather together אִתָּ֖ךְ <WH854> for עָלַ֥יִךְ <WH5921> because יִפּֽוֹל׃ <WH5307> against thee shall fall

[הֵן כ] (הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2005> behold ק) אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> Myself בָּרָ֣אתִי <WH1254> Behold I have created חָרָ֔שׁ <WH2796> the smith נֹפֵ֙חַ֙ <WH5301> that bloweth בְּאֵ֣שׁ <WH784> in the fire פֶּחָ֔ם <WH6352> the coals וּמוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> and that bringeth forth כְלִ֖י <WH3627> an instrument לְמַעֲשֵׂ֑הוּ <WH4639> for his work וְאָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> Myself בָּרָ֥אתִי <WH1254> and I have created מַשְׁחִ֖ית <WH7843> the waster לְחַבֵּֽל׃ <WH2254> to destroy

כָּל־ <WH3605> and every כְּלִ֞י <WH3627> No weapon יוּצַ֤ר <WH3335> that is formed עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5921> against לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִצְלָ֔ח <WH6743> against thee shall prosper וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every לָשׁ֛וֹן <WH3956> and every tongue תָּֽקוּם־ <WH6965> [that] shall rise אִתָּ֥ךְ <WH854> in לַמִּשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> against thee in judgment תַּרְשִׁ֑יעִי <WH7561> thou shalt condemn זֹ֡את <WH2063> likewise נַחֲלַת֩ <WH5159> This [is] the heritage עַבְדֵ֨י <WH5650> of the servants יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְצִדְקָתָ֛ם <WH6666> and their righteousness מֵאִתִּ֖י <WH853> נְאֻם־ <WH5002> [is] of me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס
